title: Denmark Mining Production
description: Mining production in Denmark increased 11.40 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Mining Production in Denmark averaged -5.45 percent from 2001 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 51.40 percent in May of 2022 and a record low of -46.60 percent in April of 2020. In Denmark, Mining and quarrying account for 4 percent of total production. This page provides - Denmark Mining Production- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Denmark
